about_the_game:
Control a space bounty hunter and embark on an odyssey of galactic empires, mafias and hordes of monstrous enemies. Everything is allowed as long as you get your precious reward.

Capelord:Bounty Hunter is a multiplayer lateral action shooter for up to 4 players, play campaign missions alone or as a team, compete against other players for loot by defeating the area boss.

Game content:
-3 characters (Yui, Alize, Run-Run)
-1 campaign mission (single player)
-1 multiplayer pvp mission (4 players)
-1 multiplayer cooperative mission (4 players)

Characters:
Yui
Yui is literally armed to the teeth. She is part of the bounty hunter group "The Furies". As his main weapon de ella she has his always reliable energy rifle with which she can measure the power of his enemies, she also has his incendiary grenade to keep an attack of hordes of enemies at bay and if that is not enough his lightsaber will cut in an instant any adversary.

Alize:
Alize is proof that speed is a weapon. She is the youngest member of "The Furies" but her lethality with her bow is unquestionable, she loves and respects all the members of her team and especially Run-Run who sees her as a mother. As a support weapon she has an energy shield that repels any projectile, she is also an expert in aerial acrobatics and in handling a short lightsaber.

Run-Run:
Run-Run's power is only matched by its beauty of hers. She is a founding member of "The Furies", only once did she lose a match where she lost her arms that were replaced by powerful cybernetic weapons capable of producing huge energy charges with which she struck down her opponents, she was the teacher of Yui and Alize so it has many domains.


Strategize as you upgrade and customize character abilities, be prepared as new content, characters, items, and dlcs will be added regularly.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence against alien beings and robots, sexual innuendos and references
